title: GIVEAWAY: Take Our Survey for a Chance to Win A Pair of Just Released SRAM MTB Motive Ultimate Brakes
content:
BikeTiresDirect will give one lucky winner a set of SRAM’s lightest-weight, heavy-duty brakes. These are the latest and greatest brakes from SRAM MTB. These just launched and can be yours!

In addition to the latest components and tech, BikeTiresDirect is home to the world’s best selection of bicycle tires, plus tons of other cycling gear. Explore their collection of complete bikes, apparel, accessories, electronics, and much more. Be sure to check out the BikeTiresDirect Instagram for product launches, features, and community content!

Answer the short survey from the folks at BikeTiresDirect for a chance to win, and read more below about the SRAM Motive Ultimate brakes prize package for one lucky winner!

SRAM Motive Ultimate brakes

One lucky winner will receive a set of SRAM Motive Ultimate brakes (front and rear). This new brake accepts the trade-off of a few grams for a powerful brake that offers better control and later braking on speedy rides.

The Motive is the lightest heavy-duty brake SRAM has ever made. It’s nearly as mighty as the Code, the brand’s most powerful brake, with wins at World Cup DH and Red Bull Rampage

Motive features DirectLink, SRAM’s lightest weight power delivery for an incredibly solid, linear feel at the start and consistent power and control during rides.

SRAM Motive Ultimate Features

  • Stealth body designed to complement AXS cockpits
  • Tool-free reach adjust for easy customization
  • Titanium hardware and carbon lever blade with bearing pivot
  • Ultimate worthy Blasted Clear anodized finish with polished machined edges
  • Designed for use with Maxima Mineral Oil and SRAM Mineral Oil Bleed Kit only
  • Caliper features Bleeding Edge bleed port for drip-free maintenance

The Motive Ultimate brakes just launched. Visit BikeTiresDirect for more details on the Maven and Motive brakes as well as the collection of Eagle 70 & 90 drivetrains.

So how do you win a pair? Answer the questions below for your chance!
